title: Talent nite
brief_description: A cut-out animation of various humanised objects that perform on stage at a cabaret style nightclub. Dancing to a jazz-blues soundtrack the objects, and male crooner take it in turn to perform. The audience is eventually won over by an alluring stilleto shoe that symbolises woman and the womanly aspects of cabaret. Co-directed/animated/designed and concept by Craig L. Brooks and Nicole McKinnon.
